meanings.sent1: The audibility sound of the bird chirping was pleasant to my ears.
meanings.sent2: The teacher ensured that her instructions had good audibility for all students to hear.
meanings.sent3: The audibility volume of the movie was so loud that it made everyone jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The audibility of the announcement echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The audibility of the thunderstorm made it seem like the sky was roaring.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be heard.
meanings.sent1: The audibility of the singer's voice was crystal clear during the concert.
meanings.sent2: The audibility of the microphone was crucial for the success of the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The audibility of the joke was lost in the noisy room, causing confusion among the listeners.
meanings.sent4: The audibility of the distant train whistle signaled the arrival of the evening.
meanings.sent5: The audibility of the alarm clock ensured that I woke up on time for work.
